maltcms.datastructures.ms
Class Scan2D

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.datastructures.ms.Scan1D
      maltcms.datastructures.ms.Scan2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IFeatureVector, IScan
public class Scan2D
extends Scan1D

Specialization of Scan1D, adding second column times and indices, indicating the modulation periods scans belong to.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de FIXME add support for IFeatureVector, extend Scan1D functionality
